Detailed Description

Struture holding the status of the stylus.

Member Data Documentation

s16 STYLUS::DblClick

Indicates a double click

s16 STYLUS::Downtime

Number of vblanks stylus has been held

Stylus is held down

u8 STYLUS::Newpress

Stylus has been newly pressed
